title: Amazon Polly
description:
Amazon Polly is a web service that makes it easy to synthesize speech from text.

The Amazon Polly service provides API operations for synthesizing high-quality speech from plain text and Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML), along with managing pronunciations lexicons that enable you to get the best results for your application domain.

NextToken.description: The pagination token to use in the next request to continue the listing of voices. NextToken is returned only if the response is truncated.

Voices.description: A list of voices with their properties.

Lexicon.Content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<lexicon version="1.0" 
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/01/pronunciation-lexicon"
      xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
      xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.w3.org/2005/01/pronunciation-lexicon 
        http://www.w3.org/TR/2007/CR-pronunciation-lexicon-20071212/pls.xsd"
      alphabet="ipa" 
      xml:lang="en-US">
  <lexeme>
    <grapheme>W3C</grapheme>
    <alias>World Wide Web Consortium</alias>
  </lexeme>
</lexicon>
Lexicon.Name: example

Lexicon.description: Lexicon object that provides name and the string content of the lexicon.

LexiconAttributes.description: Metadata of the lexicon, including phonetic alphabetic used, language code, lexicon ARN, number of lexemes defined in the lexicon, and size of lexicon in bytes.

InvalidLexiconException.description: Amazon Polly can't find the specified lexicon. Verify that the lexicon's name is spelled correctly, and then try again.
InvalidLexiconException.title: InvalidLexiconException

InvalidNextTokenException.description: The NextToken is invalid. Verify that it's spelled correctly, and then try again.
InvalidNextTokenException.title: InvalidNextTokenException

InvalidSampleRateException.description: The specified sample rate is not valid.
InvalidSampleRateException.title: InvalidSampleRateException

InvalidSsmlException.description: The SSML you provided is invalid. Verify the SSML syntax, spelling of tags and values, and then try again.
InvalidSsmlException.title: InvalidSsmlException

Lexicon.description: Provides lexicon name and lexicon content in string format. For more information, see Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0.

Content.description: Lexicon content in string format. The content of a lexicon must be in PLS format.

Lexicon.title: Lexicon

LexiconAttributes.description: Contains metadata describing the lexicon such as the number of lexemes, language code, and so on. For more information, see Managing Lexicons.

Alphabet.description: Phonetic alphabet used in the lexicon. Valid values are ipa and x-sampa.

LanguageCode.description: Language code that the lexicon applies to. A lexicon with a language code such as "en" would be applied to all English languages (en-GB, en-US, en-AUS, en-WLS, and so on.

LastModified.description: Date lexicon was last modified (a timestamp value).

LexemesCount.description: Number of lexemes in the lexicon.

LexiconArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the lexicon.

Size.description: Total size of the lexicon, in characters.

LexiconAttributes.title: LexiconAttributes

LexiconDescription.description: Describes the content of the lexicon.
LexiconDescription.title: LexiconDescription

LexiconNotFoundException.description:
Amazon Polly can't find the specified lexicon. This could be caused by a lexicon that is missing, its name is misspelled or specifying a lexicon that is in a different region.

Verify that the lexicon exists, is in the region (see ListLexicons) and that you spelled its name is spelled correctly. Then try again.
LexiconNotFoundException.title: LexiconNotFoundException

LexiconSizeExceededException.description: The maximum size of the specified lexicon would be exceeded by this operation.
LexiconSizeExceededException.title: LexiconSizeExceededException

Lexicons.description: A list of lexicon names and attributes.

NextToken.description: The pagination token to use in the next request to continue the listing of lexicons. NextToken is returned only if the response is truncated.

MarksNotSupportedForFormatException.description: Speech marks are not supported for the OutputFormat selected. Speech marks are only available for content in json format.
MarksNotSupportedForFormatException.title: MarksNotSupportedForFormatException

MaxLexemeLengthExceededException.description: The maximum size of the lexeme would be exceeded by this operation.
MaxLexemeLengthExceededException.title: MaxLexemeLengthExceededException

MaxLexiconsNumberExceededException.description: The maximum number of lexicons would be exceeded by this operation.
MaxLexiconsNumberExceededException.title: MaxLexiconsNumberExceededException

Content.description: Content of the PLS lexicon as string data.

ServiceFailureException.description: An unknown condition has caused a service failure.
ServiceFailureException.title: ServiceFailureException

SsmlMarksNotSupportedForTextTypeExceptio.description: SSML speech marks are not supported for plain text-type input.
SsmlMarksNotSupportedForTextTypeExceptio.title: SsmlMarksNotSupportedForTextTypeException

example.Text: All Gaul is divided into three parts

LexiconNames.description: List of one or more pronunciation lexicon names you want the service to apply during synthesis. Lexicons are applied only if the language of the lexicon is the same as the language of the voice. For information about storing lexicons, see PutLexicon.

OutputFormat.description: The format in which the returned output will be encoded. For audio stream, this will be mp3, ogg_vorbis, or pcm. For speech marks, this will be json.

SampleRate.description:
The audio frequency specified in Hz.

The valid values for mp3 and ogg_vorbis are "8000", "16000", and "22050". The default value is "22050".

Valid values for pcm are "8000" and "16000" The default value is "16000".

SpeechMarkTypes.description: The type of speech marks returned for the input text.

Text.description: Input text to synthesize. If you specify ssml as the TextType, follow the SSML format for the input text.

TextType.description: Specifies whether the input text is plain text or SSML. The default value is plain text. For more information, see Using SSML.

VoiceId.description: Voice ID to use for the synthesis. You can get a list of available voice IDs by calling the DescribeVoices operation.

TextLengthExceededException.description: The value of the "Text" parameter is longer than the accepted limits. The limit for input text is a maximum of 3000 characters total, of which no more than 1500 can be billed characters. SSML tags are not counted as billed characters.
TextLengthExceededException.title: TextLengthExceededException

UnsupportedPlsAlphabetException.description: The alphabet specified by the lexicon is not a supported alphabet. Valid values are x-sampa and ipa.
UnsupportedPlsAlphabetException.title: UnsupportedPlsAlphabetException

UnsupportedPlsLanguageException.description: The language specified in the lexicon is unsupported. For a list of supported languages, see Lexicon Attributes.
UnsupportedPlsLanguageException.title: UnsupportedPlsLanguageException

Id.description: Amazon Polly assigned voice ID. This is the ID that you specify when calling the SynthesizeSpeech operation.

LanguageName.description: Human readable name of the language in English.

Name.description: Name of the voice (for example, Salli, Kendra, etc.). This provides a human readable voice name that you might display in your application.
